title: Somewhat similar to Copperplate, but Q is unique.
author: juneoneal

comments.content:
Not enough bold but /Q tail is correct, they may have started with [Copperplate Classic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317065428/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/wiescherdesign/copperplate-classic)...  
Vector logo freely available to download [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317065428/http:/www.brandsoftheworld.com/logo/sociedad-quimica-y-minera).
Ryuk, YOU are MAGNIFICENT! Thank you for taking the time to help me! Saved me HOURS of trouble! Thanks again!
